title: Some kind of error. Please Help me.
body:
So, How you see in screen-shot. I have Error installing league of legends patch. I dont know why its happening. 
Im stucking in 1156,1/1608,6 Mb.  All my space is free, all is fine. Please Help me what can i do to fix it!.

replies.body: Usually, those repatches will only happen when the client notices some damaged or missing game files, which *could* have resulted in a crash. If it's not downloading anymore it may have lost its connection to the patching servers for some random reason. Try giving that go again with a wired connection as well as adjusting your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to get a smoother link to those patching servers.
